docs.snippet: Our Facebook messenger experiment is over. Thanks to everyone who joined.
We’ve heard about its power to help us empathize with others. But what if, instead, it’s just cocooning us with our friends?

headline.print_headline: Is Social Media Disconnecting Us From the Big Picture?
headline.main: Is Social Media Disconnecting Us From the Big Picture?

docs.snippet: The tech billionaire is known for bucking convention, but his backing of Mr. Trump’s presidential bid has outraged much of Silicon Valley.

headline.print_headline: Peter Thiel, Contrarian Tech Billionaire, Defends His Support of Trump
headline.main: Peter Thiel Defends His Most Contrarian Move Yet: Supporting Trump

docs.abstract: Tech billionaire Peter Thiel defends his decision to donate $1.25 million to Donald J Trump's presidential campaign; backing of controversial candidate has raised more controversy for Thiel than revelations he funded lawsuit that ultimately shut down news site Gawker.

docs.snippet: A Washington pizzeria has been the victim of a barrage of false articles on social media and fake news sites saying their pizzeria was a front for a child trafficking ring led by Hillary Clinton.

headline.main: Anti-Clinton Fake News Casts Pizzeria as Front for Crime

docs.snippet: A push is underway to standardize some forms of measurement across websites that host video, information that is now largely self-reported.

headline.print_headline: Counting Views Is Not as Easy as 1, 2, 3
headline.main: The Online Video View: We Can Count It, but Can We Count on It?

docs.abstract: Advertising column; Facebook's recent admission it miscalculated video viewing metric underscores difficulties of discerning effectiveness of video advertising in self-reporting environment; Assn of National Advertisers is pushing for standardization of what qualifies as video view as well as independent vetting of video view numbers.

docs.snippet: She said her husband was abducted in April 2015 and has since been held by the Houthis, despite an F.B.I.-led effort that rescued two hostages.

headline.print_headline: Wife of American Held in Yemen Speaks Out
headline.main: Wife of American Detained in Yemen Publicly Calls for Release

docs.abstract: Jihan Mohamed accuses United States government of neglecting abduction and detention of her husband American citizen Wallead Yusuf Pitts Luqman by Houthi rebels in Yemen; cites recent release of other American detainees, some of whom describe being beaten in custody.

docs.snippet: On my block, we’ve been through too much together to divide along party lines.
An election show streaming on Facebook Live is fueling speculation that Donald J. Trump is laying the groundwork for a media empire to come.

headline.print_headline: Fledgling Framework for a Media Future: Trump TV Live
headline.main: Trump TV Offers (Fledgling) Framework for Potential Media Future

docs.abstract: Many wonder whether Trump Tower Live, newly launched Trump campaign-produced election talk show streaming on Facebook Live, is forerunner to future Trump-focused television network.

docs.snippet: Boris Johnson sees himself as James Bond against Brussels. He’s on the wrong mission.
A weekly comic strip featured in the Sunday Review.
